title: Winter of Code 5.0 Inaugural Ceremony
description: The official start of Winter of Code! Join us for an introductory session where we'll walk you through the program's timeline, expectations, and the exciting journey ahead.
detailedDescription: This is our flagship event where we launch Winter of Code 5.0. Meet the core team, understand the program structure, and get inspired by previous success stories. All participants must attend this inaugural session to understand the program flow, submission guidelines, and evaluation criteria.

title: Open Source 101
description: A comprehensive workshop focused on helping students write strong, well-structured project proposals that stand out.
detailedDescription: Learn from experienced mentors how to craft compelling project proposals. This workshop covers proposal structure, documentation best practices, timeline planning, and addressing mentor feedback. Bring your project ideas and get real-time guidance on improving your proposals. We'll review sample proposals and conduct live critiques.
agenda: Common Mistakes & How to Avoid Them
